mapper.insert: insert into Home_Reserv_tb (rev_num, lessor_id, imcha_id, home_num, rev_date, rev_time) values ((select nvl(max(rev_num), 0) + 1 from Home_Reserv_tb), #{lessorId}, #{imchaId}, #{homeNum}, #{revDate}, #{revTime} )
mapper.select: select rev_time from Home_Reserv_tb where home_num = #{homeNum} and rev_date = TO_DATE(#{revDate}) and rev_state < 2
select from Home_Reserv_tb where LESSOR_ID = #{lessorId} and revState != 2
mapper.update: update Home_Reserv_tb set revState = 2 where IMCHA_ID = #{imchaId} and home_num = #{homeNum} and rev_num = #{revNum}
update Home_Reserv_tb set revState = 1 where IMCHA_ID = #{imchaId} and home_num = #{homeNum} and rev_num = #{revNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Home_Reserv_tb WHERE revDate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{revDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{revDate})+1
